channel.title: Help! me pleas [i can't wear items]
channel.description:
hello,
pleas can someone help me with my client. in the picture downside here you can see that i cant wear the right item, "nothing interesting is happening". [img]http://filestore-stylescape.webs.com/cant_wear.png[/img]
But on the left item (custom), then i get no error. so i can't wear normal items but i can wear custom items. so how can i change the normal item to wear it?
thanks if you helped me :)

item.title: Help! me pleas [i can't wear items]

item.description:
@k1lguy wrote:

hello,

pleas can someone help me with my client. in the picture downside here you can see that i cant wear the right item, “nothing interesting is happening”.

But on the left item (custom), then i get no error. so i can’t wear normal items but i can wear custom items.
so how can i change the normal item to wear it?
